latestRoundData().details: All values are returned directly from the target Chainlink ETH/USD aggregator, other than `answer_`, which is inverted to give the USD/ETH rate, and is given the local precision of `DECIMALS`.

returns.answer_: The `answer` value returned by the Chainlink aggregator, inverted to USD/ETH
returns.answeredInRound_: The `answeredInRound` value returned by the Chainlink aggregator
returns.roundId_: The `roundId` value returned by the Chainlink aggregator
returns.startedAt_: The `startedAt` value returned by the Chainlink aggregator
returns.updatedAt_: The `updatedAt` value returned by the Chainlink aggregator

decimals().notice: The decimals used for rate precision of this simulated aggregator

latestRoundData().notice: The latest round data for this simulated aggregator
